Reviews.Title: Cool phone
Reviews.Author: J. Mitchell "-James & Lynn Mitchell"
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Got it for my daughter at Christmas. Pulled the SIM card from her previous, instert, power up and voila.Enter your home router WPA or WEP code and you're also hooked into the web. Easy to setup. Nice clear LCD. Good choice.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Christie Pavelock
Reviews.Content: This phone not only looks nice but has the capacity to do what many of the newer smartphones can do.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: DoubleAA
Reviews.Content: I bought this mid range phone because I wanted to introduce someone to the android world. The person is extremely satisfied but I, as a tech savvy, am taking out a star because of the resolution of the screen.  Otherwise, excellent.

Reviews.Title: The only phone i Need!
Reviews.Author: smartshopper
Reviews.Content: This phone rocks! I love that it has an FM, it keeps me entertained while strolling my baby in the park. It does not come with a manual, but really you don't need one. Just set the language to english and from there start exploring. You will love it when you get the hang of it. I recommend it very much! I'm in love with my phone! It's like an Iphone plus FM but with a cheaper price. Connect with your wifi and boom! start the downloading all the apps that you like.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Luis J. Castaneda P "CHEO CASTAÑEDA"
Reviews.Content: Very good phone, as recommended. It's A GOOD ALTERNATIVE, AND WITH VERY GOOD ECONOMIC APPLICATIONS AND FUNCTIONS. IDEAL FOR PEOPLE WITH LOW BUDGET. CAUTION TO MUCH time to place CASES THAT COVERS OR BLOCK THE PROXIMITY SENSOR BECAUSE HAVE PROBLEMS. BUT IT NOT VERY GOOD TEAM. NOT RECOMMEND ...

Reviews.Title: it was a gift
Reviews.Author: Valerii
Reviews.Content: and my cousin liked at first.. but now i have noticed that even with WiFi internet is very slow.. phone freezes too much and camera is very low quality.. it was unlocked and she used a Mexican SIM card that worked right away .. set up  was just like any other phone..

Reviews.Title: Bad quality
Reviews.Author: Xingyue Li
Reviews.Content: Bad quality. The ringtone stopped working already. Originally thought that was a configuration problem, so set the ringtone volume to the max. Eventually had to check "Ringtone with vibration". Will not buy LG anymore.

Reviews.Title: Nice features...but somethings in Chinese?
Reviews.Author: Noel
Reviews.Content: Good phone, reliable, updatable and responsive to multitasking. SIM may have to upgraded to support 3G/4G compatibility. Compatible with T mobile

Reviews.Title: Honestly I am very grateful, pleased and happy with the product purchased.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: How do you rate this product?Excellent, happy with the product.Why did you choose this rating?Because I really like and the quality is excellent.What did you like or not like?Everything I like, there's nothing wrong.Who would you recommend this product?When anyone asked me, I would recommend without hesitation.Thanks, I really congratulate them.

Reviews.Title: SLOW
Reviews.Author: meao
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE CONDITION IS PERFECT, LOOKS NICE. EVERYTHING IS FINE, BUT THE SPEED. IT IS TOO SLOW. AS A $170 PHONE. IT PROBABLY LIKE THIS. JUST TOO SLOW

Reviews.Title: For the money, this phone is a real value.
Reviews.Author: Michael C. Panknin
Reviews.Content: This phone has a great deal to recommend it, it turns on quickly, has excellent reception, and the latest Android operating system.  The things I don't like are: preloaded and irremovable apps in  Chinese (I would guess this phone was originally for the Asian market) and somewhat limited battery life when the wi-fi, bluetooth, and GPS are turned on.  I'm looking into a heavier duty battery as it spends some time on the charger every morning.  For about $150.00 you'll be getting a phone very comparable in quality and features to either the last generation I Phone or a Galaxy 3.  And, of course it's unlocked so it can be used with any GSM carrier, a big plus, at least for me.

Reviews.Title: it's reaally slow
Reviews.Author: Bougouma Gerald
Reviews.Content: LG Optimus L5 is a great phone,but it's really slow.Sometime,it turned off by itself.To make a call,I have to wait like 30 second before making.it's the same when I want to hang up.and using the WIFI,it's making my phone really slow again,and I have to turn off again,and restart it before it work propertly....in somme,that phone is very slow...

Reviews.Title: Excelent but not for a noob
Reviews.Author: Haral Jonas Serafini
Reviews.Content: Very good features. Fast processor, good signal. Missing language package for Brazilian Portuguese. Battery still under evaluation - it seems bluetooth turned on compromises a little bit more than expected.

Reviews.Title: bueno
Reviews.Author: Juan viña "juan viña"
Reviews.Content: llego en buen estado el telefono es muy bueno esta en uso aun no ha presentado falla algunas me gusto

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Rafael Feliz Jimenez
Reviews.Content: Jamas te atrevas a comprar este celular, es lo mas lento que pueda existir en el mundo, el vendedor debe reembolsarme mi dinero, el primer y segundo mes funciono mas o menos, pensè que no lo conocia bien, pero despues vi que no sirve para nada, no vale la pena comprar algo asi, me costo mucho dinero, quiero que me reembolsen lo que me costò, vale la pena devolver esto.Never dare to buy this phone, is more slowly that may exist in the world, the salesman my money must repay it me, the first and second month it worked more or less, I thought that not it knew well, but then I saw that it is useless, not worth buying something like that, I cost much money, I want that they reimburse me what I costIt is worth returning this.
